channel.title: CVE Feed for MightyThemes -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for MightyThemes -- all

item.title: CVE-2024-24846|2024-02-05T06:20:05.671Z -- MightyThemes -- Mighty Addons for Elementor
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in MightyThemes Mighty Addons for Elementor allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Mighty Addons for Elementor: from n/a through 1.9.3.

item.title: CVE-2024-30556|2024-03-31T19:46:19.921Z -- MightyThemes -- Mighty Classic Pros And Cons
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in MightyThemes Mighty Classic Pros And Cons allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Mighty Classic Pros And Cons: from n/a through 2.0.9.
